013package org.apache.juneau.microservice.jetty.template;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.HtmlDocConfig;
016import org.apache.juneau.microservice.jetty.resources.DebugResource;
017import org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources.ConfigResource;
018import org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.BasicRestServletGroup;
020import org.apache.juneau.rest.widget.ContentTypeMenuItem;
021import org.apache.juneau.rest.widget.ThemeMenuItem;
022
023/**
024 * Root microservice page.
025 *
026 * <ul class='seealso'>
027 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../../overview-summary.html#my-jetty-microservice">my-jetty-microservice</a>
028 * </ul>
029 *
030 * @serial exclude
031 */
032@Rest(
033   path="/*",
034   title="My Microservice",
035   description="Top-level resources page",
036   children={
037      HelloWorldResource.class,
038      ConfigResource.class,
039      DebugResource.class
040   }
041)
042@HtmlDocConfig(
043   widgets={
044      ContentTypeMenuItem.class,
045      ThemeMenuItem.class
046   },
047   navlinks={
048      "api: servlet:/api",
049      "stats: servlet:/stats"
050   }
051)
052public class RootResources extends BasicRestServletGroup {
053   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
054}
